title: De-ice an Aircraft
description: During winter operations, an aircraft has accumulated snow and ice on its wings and must be de-iced before departure.

tasks.description: The flight crew requests de-icing from the ground crew.
tasks.expected_outcome: Ground crew receives and acknowledges the request.

tasks.description: The de-icing truck sprays the aircraft's critical surfaces with de-icing fluid.
tasks.expected_outcome: The de-icing procedure is performed correctly.

tasks.description: The ground crew informs the flight crew of the type of fluid used and the start time of the final application, which determines the holdover time.
tasks.expected_outcome: Ground crew provides the pilots with the necessary information for a safe takeoff.
